mapper.select: SELECT ${tableName}.NO, ${tableName}.WRITER, ${tableName}.TITLE, ${tableName}.CONTENT, nf.nfile, nf.ofile, DATE ( ${tableName}.REGDATE) AS REGDATE, ${tableName}.VISITCOUNT FROM ${tableName} LEFT OUTER JOIN NOTICE_FILE NF ON ${tableName}.NO = NF.fileNO ORDER BY ${tableName}.NO DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, VISITCOUNT) VALUES #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 1
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET writer = #{writer}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, regdate = now() WHERE NO = #{NO}
